author: Lauren Edmonds
title: Sam Altman says Elon Musk's idea of putting data centers in space is 'ridiculous'
description: While in New Delhi on Friday, OpenAI CEO Sam Altman said "there will come a time" for orbital data centers, but it won't be anytime soon.
content:
OpenAI and SpaceX could have massive IPOs this year.Chip Somodevilla/Getty Images; Fabrice COFFRINI/AFP via Getty Images
<ul><li>Elon Musk's SpaceX wants to launch satellites that act as data center… [+2538 chars]
